name: tm36
effect: Teaches Sludge Bomb to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Sludge Bomb to a compatible Pokémon. (Gen I: Selfdestruct)

flavor_text.ruby_sapphire: Hurls sludge at the foe. It may poison the foe.
flavor_text.emerald: Hurls sludge at the foe. It may poison the foe.
flavor_text.firered_leafgreen: Filthy sludge is hurled at the foe. It may poison the target.
